location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter to John Beaumont and George Green, Factors at Bushire from William Digges LaTouche at Bussora (Basra)

physicalDescription.extent: The item is damaged and has three small holes in its text.

mods.abstract: Letter reports LaTouche's hopes that George Abraham is now near Schiras [Shiraz]. A request is made for a copy of Bushire's general books. It is noted that the Grabis in need of repairs. Shipped by Shaik Nassir.
